alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:07AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Washtenaw County through 100 AM EDT... At 1207 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hamburg to near Chelsea to near Grass Lake. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Dexter around 1210 AM EDT. Whitmore Lake around 1215 AM EDT. Ann Arbor around 1220 AM EDT. Salem and Dixboro around 1225 AM EDT. Ypsilanti and Saline around 1230 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Hudson Mills, Pittsfield Township, Lyndon Township, Hudson Mills Metropark, Delhi Mills, Pleasant Lake and Barton Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
